hooks.command: echo 'Reminder: Run tests before committing. Use conventional commits. Current project: claude-swarm (multi-agent orchestration).'

FILE=$(cat | node -e "const d=JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync(0,'utf8')); console.log(d.tool_input?.file_path||'')"); if [[ "$FILE" == *.ts ]] || [[ "$FILE" == *.tsx ]]; then npx prettier --write "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true; fi

INPUT=$(cat); CMD=$(echo "$INPUT" | node -e "const d=JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync(0,'utf8')); console.log(d.tool_input?.command||'')"); if echo "$CMD" | grep -qE '^git commit'; then if [ ! -f /tmp/claude-precommit-pass ]; then echo 'Run npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test first, then touch /tmp/claude-precommit-pass' >&2; exit 2; fi; rm -f /tmp/claude-precommit-pass; fi; exit 0
